mapper.select: SELECT p.PINGNUM ,p.LONGITUDE, p.LATITUDE, p.ADDRESS, COUNT(p.PINGNUM) tc FROM PING p LEFT JOIN TRAVEL t ON p.PINGNUM = t.PINGNUM INNER JOIN HEART h ON t.BOARDNUM = h.BOARDNUM WHERE p.ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' OR t.BOARDTITLE LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' OR t.BOARDCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' GROUP BY p.PINGNUM, p.LONGITUDE, p.LATITUDE, p.ADDRESS ORDER BY tc DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM r, reco.* FROM ( SELECT t.BOARDNUM, t.FILENAME, COUNT(t.BOARDNUM) tc FROM TRAVEL t INNER JOIN HEART h ON t.BOARDNUM = h.BOARDNUM WHERE CHILDBOARD IS NOT NULL AND PINGNUM IN ( SELECT PINGNUM FROM PING WHERE LATITUDE BETWEEN (#{latitude}-0.0044) AND (#{latitude}+0.0044) AND LONGITUDE BETWEEN (#{longitude}-0.0056) AND (#{longitude}+0.0056) AND PINGNUM NOT IN (#{pingNum}) ) GROUP BY t.BOARDNUM, t.FILENAME, t.HIT ORDER BY tc DESC, t.HIT DESC ) reco ) WHERE 4 >= r
